attributes.action: Stop all expenses and have every last penny repaid
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Since MPs think they are so hard done by and that the rules are unclear we, the People, should make it simpler.

Pay back ALL expenses and close the expenses system.  MPs will just have to live off of their huge salaries (which require no results beyond a stage-managed public appearance).

We no longer want to pay our leaders "expenses" of any kind since they obviously cannot be trusted with the system.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
